description.displayText: Diane has been working for us as a babysitter for two years and we love her. She has demonstrated tremendous responsibility in taking care of our children. She is punctual, kind, trustworthy and great with children.
description.originalText: Diane has been working for us as a babysitter for two years and we love her. She has demonstrated tremendous responsibility in taking care of our children. She is punctual, kind, trustworthy and great with children.

description.displayText: She was very responsible. I could rely on her completely without having to worry will she be on time or will my son be picked up from school on time. She was a very good friend to my 7 year old son and she is my son's best sitter till date!
description.originalText: She was very responsible. I could rely on her completely without having to worry will she be on time or will my son be picked up from school on time. She was a very good friend to my 7 year old son and she is my son's best sitter till date!

description.displayText: My in laws and parents normally watch our son. But whenever we needed someone to watch him when they were not available she was there for us. She took notes on all his feeding and BM's. we have a dog too and it was no problem for her to watch hem both!!  Great person and would recommend without a doubt.
description.originalText: My in laws and parents normally watch our son. But whenever we needed someone to watch him when they were not available she was there for us. She took notes on all his feeding and BM's. we have a dog too and it was no problem for her to watch hem both!!  Great person and would recommend without a doubt.

description.displayText: My kids (4 and 1) love Diane- I use her for babysitting a couple times a year for a few years now, for a night out etc- she really is amazing and super trustworthy..she is the most awesome person! She always brings a little educational gift for the kids when she comes (number books etc)..I shouldn't be writing this bc she's all mine ;) but if you are looking for someone to care for your babes, she's the best! My son always talks about her and all the fun they had.
description.originalText: My kids (4 and 1) love Diane- I use her for babysitting a couple times a year for a few years now, for a night out etc- she really is amazing and super trustworthy..she is the most awesome person! description.displayText: Diane has been sitting for us for over a year now. She is excellent with our daughter (15 months)! We have the utmost trust in Diane, she started watching our daughter when she was 2 months old and has been the most caring, helpful, flexible babysitter we could have asked for. Our daughter absolutely loves her and we consider her a part of our family. Diane is very interactive with our daughter, thinks of new creative activities, and follows our parenting style. We are truly lucky to have her as our daughter's sitter and would highly recommend her to any family.
description.originalText: Diane has been sitting for us for over a year now. She is excellent with our daughter (15 months)! We have the utmost trust in Diane, she started watching our daughter when she was 2 months old and has been the most caring, helpful, flexible babysitter we could have asked for. Our daughter absolutely loves her and we consider her a part of our family. Diane is very interactive with our daughter, thinks of new creative activities, and follows our parenting style. We are truly lucky to have her as our daughter's sitter and would highly recommend her to any family.

description.displayText: Diane is a very reliable, attentive, and competent babysitter. I would highly recommend Diane if you want someone who can feel complete comfortable leaving your children with. She is our full time babysitter and I think we are very blessed to have her as a part of our family. She is always coming up with creative new games and toys to play with our infant daughter. Diane is also very detail oriented and always informs me asap if there's anything out of the ordinary. All in all great sitter for children of all ages.
description.originalText: Diane is a very reliable, attentive, and competent babysitter. Diane is also very detail oriented and always informs me asap if there's anything out of the ordinary. All in all great sitter for children of all ages.

description.displayText: Diane worked for our family last year. She watched our 3 boys (ages 10, 9 and 3) and was a wonderful babysitter. She is hands on, interactive, warm, loving, funny and I completely and fully trusted her with our boys. She helped with homework and took the boys on educational outings. To this day, the boys still ask for her and tell us that she was the best babysitter! Diane would be a great addition to anyone's family!
description.originalText: Diane worked for our family last year. She watched our 3 boys (ages 10, 9 and 3) and was a wonderful babysitter. description.displayText: Diane is a wonderful babysitter!!  She is kind, caring, punctual, helpful, flexible.  Our 3 boys love her!!  She helps our older boys (9 and 8) with their homework and keeps them in line while doing so many great things with them.  Our youngest son (3) completely adores her and I bet she will have him out of diapers before the summer ends!  She has a been a huge asset to my husband and I and we are extremely lucky to have found her.  Even our neighbors and pediatrician have given us really positive feedback on Diane.
